overview:
#Daisaku Harada :CEO/ Founder

He worked at Walt Disney Company as a mobile producer and led a lot of mobile apps and Social Games to success in Japan. He had a success in mobile e-commerce service field when he was in CYBIRD with Nobuaki Suzuki CTO of Zawatt. Daisaku is also known as a producer of â€œBudget like RPGâ€ iOS/Android app, got the highest award of mobile widget contest hold by Yahoo! and SoftBank in 2009. Daisaku is the evangelist to change the world by Zawatt service.
